snippet: Forty-three nominees are awaiting action by the Senate, where Republicans are protesting Democrat-led changes to rules governing filibusters.
abstract: Conflict in Senate, along with new rules enacted by chamber's Democrats to fight filibusters, have held up confirmation of some 43 ambassador nominees; logjam presents particular difficulties as Pres Obama prepares large-scale diplomatic engagement with African nations, for which 13 ambassadors remain unconfirmed.
lead_paragraph: Forty-three nominees are awaiting action by the Senate, where Republicans are protesting Democrat-led changes to rules governing filibusters.

headline.main: Conflict in Senate Creates a Logjam of Ambassador Confirmations
headline.print_headline: Conflict in Senate Creates a Logjam of Ambassador Confirmations
